english.segment1: I don't know where you lay your head. or where you call your home. I don't know where you eat your meals. or where you talk on the phone. I don't know if you got a cook. a butler or a maid. I don't know if you got a year. with a hammock in the shade
english.segment2: I don't know if you got some shelter. say a place to hide. I don't know if you live with friends. in whom you can confide. I don't know if you got a family. say a mom or dad. I don't know if you feel love at all. but I bet you wish you had
english.segment3: Come and go with me. to my Fathers house. Come and go with me. to my Fathers house
english.segment4: It's a big big house. with lots and lots a room. A big big table. with lots and lots of food. A big big yard. where we can play football. A big big house. Its my Fathers house
english.segment5: Ibidibidee bop bop bow whew! yeah!
english.segment6: All I know is a big ole house. with rooms for everyone. All I know is lots a land. where we can play and run. All I know is you need love. and I've got a family. All I know is your all alone. so why not come with me?
english.segment7: Come and go with me. to my Fathers house. Come and go with me. to my Fathers house
english.segment8: It's a big big house. with lots and lots a room. A big big table. with lots and lots of food. A big big yard. where we can play football. A big big house. Its my Fathers house
english.segment9: Come and go with me. to my Fathers house. Come and go with me. to my Fathers house
english.segment10: It's a big big house. with lots and lots a room. A big big table. with lots and lots of food. A big big yard. where we can play football. A big big house. Its my Fathers house
